Package imusim :: Package algorithms :: Module position :: Class ContactTrackingKalmanFilter

Class ContactTrackingKalmanFilter

source code

Estimates position based on root acceleration and estimated ground contact.

Method Details

__init__(self, model, initialTime=0, initialPosition=array([[0..., initialVelocity=array([[0..., accelerationVar=0.2, velocityVar=0.5, rejectionProbabilityThreshold=0.4, **kwargs)
(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise position estimator.

Parameters:
  • model - SampledBodyModel to update.
  • initialTime - The time at which the the initialPosition is sampled
  • initialPosition - Initial position vector (3x1 np.ndarray).
  • initialVelocity - Initial velocity estimate (3x1 np.ndarray)
  • accelerationVar - Acceleration variance (float).
  • velocityVar - Velocity variance (float).
  • rejectionProbabilityThreshold - Probability below which a velocity update will be rejected (float, 0 <= p <= 1)
Decorators:
  • @prepend_method_doc(PositionEstimator)
Overrides: object.__init__

estimateVelocityProbabilities(self, dt, t)

source code 

Estimate the possible velocities (and probabilities) of the model.

Estimates are based on the assumption that a point is stationary in world co-ordinates in the interval `[t-dt,t]`

Returns:
The velocity with the highest probabilty of not being wrong
